browserActionTitle.description: Title text for the browser action icon.

extDesc.message: Simply the best proxy interface for chrome.

optTitle.description: Page title of the Options page.

optProxyListHeader.description: Header for the list of proxies on the options page.

optAddProxyButton.description: Add Proxy Button Text on the options page.

optSystemHeader.description: Header for system settings on the options page.

optIncognitoLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to only proxy incognito windows on the options page

optOffLabel.description: Label for the setting to choose behavior when proxy is turned off on the options page

optOffValueClear.description: Option indicating chrome can choose what to do when proxxy is disabled.

optOffValueDirect.description: Option indicating that chrome should attempt to connect directly when proxxy is disabled.

optOffValueSystem.description: Option indicating that chrome should use the system proxy settings when proxxy is disabled.

optOffValueAuto.description: Option indicating that chrome should use a network wpad proxy when proxxy is disabled.

optSaveButton.description: Button for saving proxy settings on the options page

optClearButton.description: Button for clearing proxy settings on the options page

optAboutHeader.description: Header for the 'about' section of the options page, explaining how to help.

optAboutText.message:
Want to see Proxxy in your language?  Is the extension missing features?  It's easy to
	  contribute! Just follow the link below, and post questions to the Proxxy Google+ Page.
optAboutText.description: Text at the bottom of the options page explaining proxxy development.

optAboutLink.description: Link text for the Google+ Page.
